title: Reports from a Distant Place
description: For free shipping visit www.BiblioPublishing.com and enter Goodreads-13 at checkout.Reports from a Distant Place is about life in the shadow of death. It is a unique portrayal of survival during the Holocaust, by hiding in plain sight. It is also about living, dangerously, under the Red Star. The last chapter, In America, is about hope and a reinvented life.
author: Frank Shatz
